content: Rewrite this sentence to make it more specific and succinct: Recent geological findings have provided substantial evidence that suggests the catastrophic event leading to the extinction of non-avian dinosaurs around 66 million years ago could have been caused by a celestial body, possibly a comet, colliding with the Earth.
Recent geological evidence indicates that a comet collision with Earth likely caused the extinction of non-avian dinosaurs 66 million years ago.
